value.fullName: I have already included Camp Quality in my Will.
value.label: a. I have already included Camp Quality in my Will.

value.fullName: I intend to include Camp Quality in my Will when I make or revise my Will.
value.label: b. I intend to include Camp Quality in my Will when I make or revise my Will.

value.fullName: I’m considering leaving a gift to Camp Quality in my Will.
value.label: c. I’m considering leaving a gift to Camp Quality in my Will.

value.fullName: I would like you to send me some information, please.
value.label: d. I would like you to send me some information, please.

value.fullName: It’s not for me, thank you.
value.label: e. It’s not for me, thank you.
